steps.text: Tell ◀Jinwu▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Jinwu▷ about what happened
Look for the two keys to the gunpowder storehouse (0/2)
◀Storehouse Security Key No. 1▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Storehouse_Security_Key_No._1▷: The southern key is in a pot on top of a water-filtration device.

◀Storehouse Security Key No. 2▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Storehouse_Security_Key_No._2▷: The northern key is in a dig spot near the tent. Digging will reveal a barrel. Hitting the barrel will damage the player and reveal the key. A shield or a ranged attack can be used to avoid damage.

Near the tent is a passage that allows the player to move up to the surface where there will be a ◀Luxurious Chest▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Luxurious_Chest▷ and a gate. Opening the gate will grant the ◀Wonders of the World▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Wonders_of_the_World▷ achievement ◀"All We Need Is Some Firewood and Some Vinegar..."▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/%22All_We_Need_Is_Some_Firewood_and_Some_Vinegar...%22▷ After moving up, the player can use the passage again to move back down to where they were before.
Go to open the door to the gunpowder storehouse
Look for a ◀cannonball▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/A_Set_of_Cannonballs▷
Bring the cannonball back to the camp
Make 3 Special Unmoving Essential Oils
Each oil requires ◀Cor Lapis▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Cor_Lapis▷ ×2 and ◀Frog▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Frog_(Material)▷ ×2.
Give the Special Unmoving Essential Oils to Clitopho
Finish assembling the cannonball

Completion of this step reveals the map areas for ◀The Serpent's Cave▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/The_Serpent%27s_Cave▷ and ◀Underground Waterway▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Underground_Waterway▷.
Read the Signaling Guide
Release the safety on the cannon's breech
This step can be completed as soon as the Main Mining Area becomes available during ◀Chasm Spelunkers▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Chasm_Spelunkers▷.

Near the Teleport Waypoint, there is a spot where the player can observe the locations of the lamps.◀▶◁https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/gensin-impact/images/b/b5/The_Heavenly_Stone%27s_Debris_Detail_Image_1.png/revision/latest?cb=20220330185547▷

Activating a lamp will make it pulse at a certain frequency (speed). The lamp will be in the "low frequency" setting when first activated. After activating the lamp, the player can toggle it between these two settings: "low frequency" and "high frequency".

There are three lamps that must be set in this configuration: "Low lamp post, high-frequency flicker." "Middle lamp post, low-frequency flicker." "High lamp post, low-frequency flicker."◀▶◁https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/gensin-impact/images/e/e6/The_Heavenly_Stone%27s_Debris_Detail_Image_2.png/revision/latest?cb=20240609023224▷.
When the frequencies have all been correctly set, the lamps will emit a steady glow and can no longer be interacted with.
Load the cannonball in together with Zhiqiong
Use ◀the great cannon▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Mountainator▷ to destroy the sealing rocks
Cannon alignment: left once, down twice.

Completing this step grants the ◀Wonders of the World▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Wonders_of_the_World▷ achievement ◀Maintain Safety Distance▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Maintain_Safety_Distance▷.
Go further in
Talk to Zhiqiong
Completion of this step reveals part of the map area for ◀Stony Halls▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Stony_Halls▷.
Activate the mechanism (0/3)
The player must upgrade their ◀Lumenstone Adjuvant▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Lumenstone_Adjuvant▷ to at least level 2 to complete this step.
Use the Lumenstone Adjuvant next to the ◀Oozing Concretions▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Oozing_Concretions▷, not next to the mechanisms.
At the west mechanism, the following enemy must be defeated:

Each mechanism requires 3 energy from the Lumenstone Adjuvant in order to recharge. ◀Concentrated Lumenstone Energy▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Concentrated_Lumenstone_Energy▷ can be used to recharge the Lumenstone Adjuvant and is found throughout the area. There is also a ◀Ruin Brazier▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Ruin_Brazier▷ near the south mechanism.
<img:shadowy_husk_standard_bearer> ◀Shadowy Husk: Standard Bearer▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Shadowy_Husk:_Standard_Bearer▷ ×1
Defeat the emerging monsters
<img:abyss_herald_wicked_torrents> ◀Abyss Herald: Wicked Torrents▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Abyss_Herald:_Wicked_Torrents▷ ×1
Completing this step unlocks access to ◀Nameless Ruins▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Nameless_Ruins▷ and ◀The Glowing Narrows▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/The_Glowing_Narrows▷.
Talk to Zhiqiong
